lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about conservatives' criticism of networks' coverage of the war in Afghanistan gave an erroneous name in some copies for an organization that hires monitors to watch newscasts. It is the Media Research Center, not Council.
abstract: Correction of Nov 7 article about conservatives' criticism of networks' coverage of war in Afghanistan; Media Research Center hires monitors to watch newscasts
snippet: An article on Wednesday about conservatives' criticism of networks' coverage of the war in Afghanistan gave an erroneous name in some copies for an organization that hires monitors to watch newscasts. It is the Media Research Center, not Council....
